children.value: View the payload content in the dashboard
View the content of the matched rule payload in the dashboard by entering your private key.
, expand the details of an event triggered by a rule whose Managed Ruleset has payload logging enabled.

children.alt: Firewall event with payload match available

children.value: Enter your private key in the pop-up window and select
The private key is not sent to a Cloudflare server. The decryption occurs entirely in the browser.
If the private key you entered decrypts the encrypted payload successfully, the
card displays the payload content in clear text.

children.alt: View the decrypted payload in the dashboard
